pr_title: WebClient request id added and logging messages updated

timeline.message:
WebClient request id added and logging messages updated

Signed-off-by: David Kral <david.k.kral@oracle.com>

timeline.bodyText: public method in a non-public class, also no javadoc
timeline.author: tomas-langer

replies.bodyText: ehm... yes.. This should be package private
replies.author: Verdent

timeline.bodyText: If we want to have request id, it should be configurable (esp. when using tracing, we may want to bind it to the trace id).
timeline.author: tomas-langer

timeline.message:
Request id is now configurable

Signed-off-by: David Kral <david.k.kral@oracle.com>
